p: Estimates of inactivation times for ACPT based on d N / d S ratios and equations in Sharma et al. (2018). The mean estimate for the inactivating time of ACPT on the branch of K. breviceps, D. novemcinctus and O. afer is 12.20–15.52 Ma, 10.18–11.30 Ma and 23.60–28.32 Ma, respectively ( Fig. 3). The mean estimate for the inactivation of ACPT on the Mysticeti clade is 14.05–16.30 Ma.
